roleset.name: hold together very tightly
roleset.note: CLENCH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'clench' based on sentences in brown. (from clench.01-v predicate notes)
CLENCHING-N NOTES: Corresponds with clench.01. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from clenching.01-n)

example.name: usually adjectival
example.text: It is always a temptation for a religious organization, especially a powerful or dominant one, to impose through the clenched fist of the law its creedal viewpoint upon others.

example.name: or verbal
example.text: He-1 does not know whether [*]-1 to look up or look aside, to put his hands in his pockets or to clench them at his side, to cross the street, or to continue on the same side.
Angela's clenching of her jaw causes her many headaches.
